characterDescription: Ua'pam is the peakspren bonded with Zu.

characterDetails.Appearance:
Ua'pam is described as being tall, and his skin appears as if made of cracked rock, glowing from within as if molten. Otherwise, he has generally humanlike features.
He wears fur-lined clothing in Shadesmar, like one might expect from one who lived high in the mountains in the Physical Realm.
He is bald like other peakspren, though they tend to have more cracks on each their heads than on other parts of each their bodies.
He wears a hat not unlike the one that Veil favors.
characterDetails.History: Adolin presents him with a small bag of glowing spheres in order that he and ... .
characterDetails.Beliefs: According to Ua'pam, Kasiden peakspren from the east are fools.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
The clap of his hand on Adolin's back is firm, though his stone hand is warm to the touch. (It isn't hot like Adolin might've expected from the glowing light coming from the cracks within it.)
He has a grinding voice.
